title: Person of Interest - May I have this dance ? (05x06)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: "Tomorrov their world crashes.. but we can give 'em tonight" the true spirit of Reese

I can never for the life of me figure out what kind of relationship Harold and Root have.  It's not romantic because Root loves Shaw, but sometime I wonder if Root sees Harold as a big brother or even a father sometimes

It's such a pity, that POI has been stopped after 13 episodes of Season 5. Amy Acker's Root is the most affecting, mesmerising and beloved female character on tv for millions and millions of people all over the world, not only in the US. She doesn't leave any chance not to fall in love with her! And in this particular scene she is just stunning. If she lived in the Renaissance times in Florence, we would have probably recognised her in Madonnas of Raphael and Michelangelo, as she bestows such an exquisite inspiration and delight on everyone, who is lucky to contemplate her!
Root is the most badass character on tv

Love how Root bares her soul.
never been lovelier
description:
